title: Fuel supply to Kelanitissa restored
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ceylon Electricity Board states that the fuel supply to the Kelanitissa Power Plant has commenced today (26).
The CEB Media Spokesperson, Andrew Navamani stated that the release of fuel from Muthurajawela commenced this morning.
Accordingly, the amount of fuel supplied to the Kelanitissa power plant will be 2,400 metric tons.
Therefore, the Ceylon Electricity Board stated that the operations of the power plant will continue as usual from Monday (28).
